hm... I don't know what you all are doing wrong. It has all of the supporting data files inside the Spore folder, and when you click "SporeApp" you have to click the one in the "Spore folder," not the "crack" folder.

For example, my install Desktop>Spore>Spore>SporeApp.exe
that's the one you need, not;
Desktop>crack>SporeApp.exe

@ Italianbull. If you run the one in the crack folder, it will tell you that it is missing data files, that might be why.
Make sure to run it in the right folder

@ Moonfang, I don't understand what your problem is. I don't know why it would open bitzip unless you are only clicking the torrent file again. xD
When it's done all you do is go to your folder that it's in "Spore>spore>SporeApp.exe"
[Your installation may be different]

Sorry for your inconvenience- but it should work just fine. It is for most people so I odn't understand what you're doing wrong. =/

also- which folder are you looking in?

It should be "C:\Users\Karabiner\Desktop\Spore\Spore\SporeApp.exe"
That's the file you run to start the game.

If it's not in there-- that means your file is corrupt or you stopped it before the download finished.
You'll need to re-download if it's not in that folder...

I was told I needed to update Direct X, although I have DX11.

...However, I was able to get it going perfectly when I went to download Direct X updates from here (as seen from PCSX2 web site):
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyId=2DA43D38-DB71-4C1B-BC6A-9B6652CD92A3&displaylang=en

If you are having trouble with a missing DirectX .dll, go here even if your version of DirectX is NEWER than 9.0c. Mine was DirectX 11 but I still needed to download this and update.

Unzip, press spore.exe, play.

Brilliant.
Avira indicates a trojan in Sporeapp.exe!  Beware!
TR/Crypt.XPACK.Gen specifically

Okay, "ringmanme."
I'm going to go easy on you since I'm sure you don't understand basic tech talk or are new to pirating and bootlegging copies, etc.

But xpack.gen = genetik or Trojan/Genetik which is what most antivirus programs use to describe a keylogger or a crack.

The thing about this, Most antiviruses do pick up on "keygens" or serial key cracks, when they aren't actually viruses, and is not even anything harmful to a computer. It's

as a side note: I also suggest getting something better than Avira antivirus.

Oh, also, out of 11 people you're the ONLY one to rate this negatively. That's something you should take in to consideration...
When you're downloading pirated copies of anything, pretty much any antivirus will display the crack/keygen as Trojan/Genetik or ".gen"

No, sorry.

Most "bootlegged" games do have patches so you CAN connect online with a specific game.
I don't have one for this game, but you can just look for a Spore online patch on Google or another torrent site.

OH, ma901nc...

Download 7zip to open .7z files. Extract it somewhere, where it can easily be found, [I put it on my desktop just for quick access, but you can put it anywhere]. When it's done extracting it with 7zip, you just run the SporeApp.exe file like you would with any other file.
You can't open .exe files like compressed files to play it.

All you have to do is run the SporeApp.exe like any other game or program.

Thanks a lot for this download :)

Now, for all the people who can't get the game to work:

1)Download this torrent (D'uh?)
2)Download WinRar on http://rarsoft.com
3)Once the torrent is done downloading, right-click on Spore.7z archive, and select extract to OR extract here.
4)Once it's done extracting, open the Spore Folder, then the other Spore Folder.
5)In the second Spore folder there is Spore.exe. THIS is what you launch the game with. Don't bother going to the Crack folder.

For those who doesn't see the .EXE after spore, it's only because File Extensions are hidden. You don't have to bother for that one, only check for Spore (File Type)Application.

6)HAVE FUN!
By the way, thanks a lot ProkektFUbaR for this upload, works very nice =)

I need help... im a bit of a noob with these terms seeders and leechers..... What does seed mean?????? and i think a leacher is someone that downloads it but then doesn't seed..... HELP!

Oh yeah, if you help i will +1 on quality on every one of your uploads....
How do i put creatures from the sporepedia into this?

Torrentguy, seed means to upload parts of the file for other people to download. Here is the definition from wikipedia:A seeder is a peer that has a complete copy of the torrent and still offers it for upload. The more seeders there are, the better the chances of getting a higher download speed. If the seeder seeds the whole copy of the download they should get faster downloads.

2. Install patch v1.5.1
3. Install patch v1.6
4. Install creepy and cute mod
5. install Galactic Adventures

6. WIN!
